resources.string: For the next few hours, it feels like pants weather.
For the next few hours, it feels like shorts weather.
Pants or Shorts will remember that.
In order to provide temperature measurements, the app needs location permissions!
The location permission is needed to determine weather in your area. Preferences are stored locally and no other data is tracked or stored.
Icon of snow or sun depending on hot or cold
The application no longer has access to the internet.
